name: Babazooka
description:
Babazooka is our new puzzle platformer game. It is about the small Dino Character who is stuck in a puzzle world. The main puzzle elements in the game are these boxes that achieve different functions. We have designed this game to stimulate the player's thinking as the player tries to help the Dino figure out how to use the boxes to achieve each level's objective. 

Controls KeyEffect
WASD
Move Left or Right on platforms.
Arrow Keys
Move Left or Right on platforms.
Space Bar
Allows the Player to Pick Up as well as Drop off Boxes in the stage Asset Credits
  • Game & Trailer Audio: Epic Heroic Adventure & Inspiring Background by Playsound
  • Dino Character: Dino Characters by Arks - Asset available under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
  • Icons: Nueva Icons
  • Sound Effects: Snapper4298 / michalwa2003 / Andromadax24 / SoundFlakes
